title: Pharmacy Services
overview: Pharmacy services provide comprehensive pharmaceutical care, including medication dispensing, health consultations, and wellness programs. Our licensed pharmacists ensure safe and effective use of medications.

doctors.name: Dr. Jane Doe
doctors.title: Pharmacist
doctors.description: Dr. Jane Doe is a licensed pharmacist with over 10 years of experience in community pharmacy, specializing in medication therapy management and patient education.

doctors.name: Dr. John Smith
doctors.title: Pharmacist
doctors.description: Dr. John Smith is a clinical pharmacist with expertise in chronic disease management and a passion for improving patient outcomes through personalized medication plans.

testimonial.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial.title: Satisfied Patient
testimonial.quote: The pharmacy team at The Nairobi Hospital has been incredibly helpful in managing my medications. Their personalized care and attention to detail have made a significant difference in my health journey.

relatedServices.name: Laboratory Services
relatedServices.description: Comprehensive laboratory services for accurate diagnostics and health monitoring.

relatedServices.name: Radiology Services
relatedServices.description: Advanced imaging services for accurate diagnostics and treatment planning.
